title: Over Rs 177 crore lost on account of ATM/credit card, internet banking frauds
description: A customer need not bear any loss if the deficiency is on the part of the bank and in cases, where the fault lies neither with the bank nor with the customer but lies elsewhere in the system and the customer notifies the bank within three working days of receiving the communication about the unauthorised transaction.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
